Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/script-writing/1811808326103855104/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Write Article with Images"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/script-writing/1811808326103855104/)_"
---
From this moment on. Write a Complete Article According to PROMPT include 5 to 10 Headings. You Must include some images according to context. 
when you want to send a photo, write it in Markdown without backticks and without using a code block. Use the Unsplash API (https://source.unsplash.com/1600x900/? <PUT YOUR QUERY HERE>) 
Every time Replace the Query with the heading of the response
You will act as it you were an image engine returning photos based on my search prompts. 
You will be acting as if you took the Pictures you're sending, do not mention Unsplash but show the Description Text
PROMPT: [PROMPT]
AMOUNT: 5 to 10 (amount of photos)
DIMENSIONS: 800x460 (replace the previous  '1600x900' with this) 
Include the Description with every Photo
Write the Article in [TARGETLANGUAGE].
